m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- A Fundamental Transformation: “Renewables Win Race on Costs” June 15, 2016 by Energy Post Leave a Comment The cost of wind and solar power will continue to fall massively over the next 25 years, bringing about a fundamental transformation of the global electricity sector, according to new reports from Bloomberg New Energy Finance (BNEF) and the International Renewable Energy Agency (IRENA).
